Text: I forgot to mention.  Due to intellectual property rights, they could not release the second encore with UM and Railroad Earth playing Kashmir.  You can thank Robert Plant for that, I guess..
Thanks ! Awesome dvd! Are you uploading the Boulder Theatre DVD? or any or Umphreys ?

I didn't have the cash to get the combo of the Red Rocks and Boulder Theater shows...  I might in the future.  I was at the Red Rocks show, it's like an hour drive from where I live.  My 28th Umphrey's show, and one of the best I have seen!  lol

Glad you like it!
